item.title: Cityscapes and Landscapes in British and German Romanticism (1790–1840)
item.description: The Pleasures of Imagination – Art, Architecture and Aesthetics in 18th Century Europe The Finnish Society for Eighteenth-Century Studies Conference Helsinki and on Zoom 21–22 October 2021. Aalto university, Runeberginkatu 14–16 entrance A, 3rd floor. My paper “Cityscapes and Landscapes in British and German Romanticism (1790–1840)” will be on 22 October 2021 at 14.30.
